# SaaS Documentation Hub - Workspace Instructions

## Project Overview
React + Vite application for interactive SaaS documentation with Tailwind CSS and Lucide icons.

## Setup Status
- [x] Project scaffolding complete
- [x] Dependencies configured in package.json
- [x] React components created
- [x] Tailwind CSS configured
- [ ] Dependencies installed (npm install)
- [ ] Dev server running (npm run dev)

## Installation
From the workspace root, run:
```bash
npm install
```

## Running the Project
Start the development server:
```bash
npm run dev
```

The application will open at `http://localhost:5173`

## Features
- Browse 10+ architecture documents
- Search documents by title/category
- Edit documentation in-app
- Download docs as Markdown
- Beautiful responsive UI with Tailwind CSS

## Build
```bash
npm run build
npm run preview
```
